name: Rockpack
overview:
Rockpack is the world’s first video discovery application for the digital generation.

Rockpack is at the forefront of a revolution in people’s viewing habits – we will transform how people discover, watch and share videos online. Our platform will handpick the best videos from across the web, so users aren’t forced to wade through all the clutter to get to what they want. Alongside unlocking the potential of video curation, we will encourage users to build channels, populate them with top quality videos and share these with their friends and family.

Rockpack launches in March 2013. Please follow us to keep in touch with developments and sign-up at rockpack.com for a beta test invite.

Rockpack: Watch it Your Way.
